Fsm
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Fsm.Event
public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object

An Event is defined for use in one of more Transitions. Every Event has a name (for textual identification) and a place holder for an optional object that is associated with the Event.

The Event class is abstract, hence you must define your event classes by extending Event.

See Also:
Transition
